overview:
Welcome to ACD Direct where we believe the sky is the limit.

We pride ourselves in being a forward-thinking company. By eliminating walls we have created boundless opportunities. Not just for ourselves, but for other progressive companies looking for more than just a tool.

Sound complicated? It’s actually simple.

ACD Direct offers contact center solutions specific to your business needs. Whether your contacts are inbound, outbound or both, we can deliver with exceptional agility, flexibility and simplicity. We leveraged the virtual contact center model to quickly respond to changing dynamic market conditions, take advantage of highly skilled agents in many cities, lower your operating costs and improve your bottom line. We have a proven track record working as a proactive partner with our clients, and we are committed to deliver all the benefits a virtual contact center provides.

We are here for one purpose: Connecting you with the world.

NOW HIRING!

ACD Direct has an immediate need for English and Bilingual (Spanish) individuals to process our inbound call volume in our virtual call center. Our independent contractors find our non for profit based call volume to be a refreshing break from traditional call volume they may be accustomed to. Sales, WAH, call center experience always a plus!
